Obvious troll post. Kindred is actually really weak due to its horrible scalings, base AD and attack range. The AOE Tryndamere ult works on enemies too (you obviously didn't read Kindred's abilities). How about you be thankful Riot is even releasing a new champion.

I think Kindred will actually be very shit on release, and will be buffed to an OP state after that. Kindred is the answer to the juggernaut and assasin metas. That ult will change everything if Kindred ends up being a strong champion.

I think by being on pbe and looking at vids from pbe you can see that she/he is a insane late game % hp damage dealer think about it like this her passive gives 1.5% of hp damage now with  {{item:3153}} that's 8% of hp if you do the math her passive makes 1 of the enemy jger's buffs give her 1.5% damage every 4 min her other passive lets her mark a champ every 4 min to get 1.5% of max hp by 20 to 30 min you will kill a tank faster then a full build {{champion:67}} as you will have about 20% of hp as damage a very late game champ because you no we wont the tanks to have no place in the game and get insta killed

It's hard to clear an enemy camp the exact moment it gets marked though, even if you are psychic and can predict which camp gets marked. Vayne gets to build whatever she wants because she's got CC + more mobility + true damage while Kindred has non-true damage % health and has to build Armour pen. + MS.
